Name: GDG Cloud Nairobi
Desc: Google Developers Group (GDG Nairobi) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies.

Name: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors KE
Desc: We are a group of campus leaders eager to help our fellow students, create robust tech communities, and develop technical and career skills for the future. Watch more - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJy0HetQpR4zQhDbC4mIfeg

Name: Android254
Desc: Android254 developer group brings together android developers and enthusiasts to learn about Android technologies, best practices and also hear talks from industry experts.

Name: Nairobi JavaScript Community
Desc: Community/user group focused on WEB & RELATED TECHNOLOGIES - HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript inclusive of Node.js.

Name: Nairobi Gophers
Desc: This group is for Go Enthusiasts. We aim to create a community around the language and share experiences adopting the language.

Name: Nairobi JVM
Desc: Nairobi JVM Is a great place to learn about the languages that run on the JVM, (Java, Scala,Clojure,Kotlin,Groovy,JRuby,JPython).

Name: AI Kenya Community
Desc: Ai Kenya (https://kenya.ai/) is a group for all enthusiasts, learners and developers in Machine Learning, Data Science and Artificial Intelligence in general.

Name: Nairuby
Desc: Nairuby is a community organization that was started in 2010. The community focuses on development and demonstrations on ruby technologies and frameworks, which are all open source and widely used by startups to prototype and carry out proof of concept with a go to market strategy.

Name: Atlassian Community
Desc: Atlassian Community Nairobi encourages better use of Atlassian tools, share best practices, case studies and individual perspectives.

Name: Facebook Developer Cirles
Desc: DevC Nairobi is a forum for developers in Nairobi and its surroundings who are interested in building on the Facebook platform to interact and collaborate other developers who share similar interests.

Name: Laravel Nairobi
Desc: A meetup for people interested in Laravel and Web App development

Name: GDG Nairobi
Desc: GDG is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with passion.

Name: Africa Game Developers Community
Desc: Anyone interested in building & developing game's as a business!

Name: GolangKE
Desc: Community for golang developers in Kenya

Name: PHP Kenya
Desc: PHP group for devs and wannabes

Name: Python Kenya
Desc: Community for Python developers in Kenya

Name: Payments Overflow KE
Desc: Programmers & Developers working with Payments API

Name: AndroidKE
Desc: A home for Android enthusiasts

Name: Flutter Devs Kenya
Desc: Lets talk Flutter, check flutter.dev to get started

Name: Kotlin Kenya
Desc: Kotlin language User group

Name: WordPress KE
Desc: Sharing tips and tricks about WP and other related stuff

Name: Nairobi GraphQL Meetup
Desc: Interested in building API's using GraphQL? Join us and get to learn and share more about GraphQL and get to understand how you can leverage it to build modern and scalable API's that can be consumed by any client; be it a mobile app or web app.

Name: TensorFlow Nairobi
Desc: A local community of technologists who are interested in advancing their knowledge of TensorFlow (http://tensorflow.org), its use cases and applications.

Name: Azure Community in Kenya
Desc: The Azure Meetup meets, discusses and review all Azure services, solutions and implementations. This is for all professionals in the field of security, devops, infrastructure, support, development, quality, architecture and design, business and/or data of any type or experience level. Calling all beginners, geeks and enthusiasts in the cloud space or those that want to join!.

Name: ProductHunt Nairobi
Desc: A community of makers and hunters building products together

Name: AnitaB.Org Nairobi
Desc: Local communities that connect women technologists from cities around the world to network and find support & new opportunities.

Name: Angular Kenya
Desc: An Angular Kenyan community for budding Software Developers interested in the Angular framework

Name: Hack Club Kenya
Desc: A nonprofit network of student-led high school programming clubs to teach beginners to code. Subsidiary of Hack Club

Name: React Native
Desc: A telegram group for React Native users

Name: Lepsta Developers Nairobi
Desc: We are tech community with activities in 8 cities/chapters (Pretoria, Johannesburg, Cape Town, Maputo, Lagos, Nairobi, Eldoret and Kaduna). Led by entrepreneurs who dream big and contribute to shaping the future. Operated by 6+ Local Leaders driven by bringing positive impact in the future of technology.We connect developers to industry leaders. We learn about the present to prospect the future. To get a bigger chance at having a bigger impact on the future of software development.

Name: Nairobi IPFS
Desc: We are a group of people passionate about the decentralized web and excited to learn, teach, and share ideas. Everyone is welcome!

Name: Vue JS Kenya
Desc: The community exists for anyone interested in Vue.js -. The goal is to provide monthly meetups where people give talks on Vue.js and related topic

Name: React Developer Community Kenya
Desc: A community of react developers using react related technologies in the Kenyan developer ecosystem. We discuss best practices, industry standards and how to help and mentor new developers into the ReactJS eco system

Name: MongoDB Nairobi
Desc: This community is for MongoDB users, data scientist/analysts, AI, IoT, backend developers, ML developers, cloud computing and anyone interested in emerging data technologies. MongoDB community is where the worldâ€™s fastest-growing data community comes to connect, explore, and learn.
